text: At the Altar is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithAT THE ALTARRichard Schickel. D.W. Griffith: An American Life and stars Marion Leonard, David Miles, and Charles Inslee. ==Actors== * Marion Leonard as Minnie, the Daughter * David Miles - Father * Charles Inslee as Grigo, the Suitor * Herbert Yost as Giuseppe Cassella * Anita Hendrie as Mother * Dorothy West as Minnie's Friend/Dinner Guest ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: At the Altar
